original_title: 莉奈先生の誘惑授業 石原莉奈
overview: A beautiful female teacher, boys are tossed by her sweet sexual skills ... A beautiful teacher who is more indecent than anyone and more splendid than anyone! A pheromone that is too rich seduces the crotch of young people and shoots sperm with a healing smile and superb sexual skills!
title: Teacher Rina's Alluring Lesson
